data.message: He dropped rap god in 2013 and phenomenal couple months ago. Have you seen Shady XV? My dude never gets old. Hit me up when you've accomplished what he has, with the resources he had.

replies.message: Last year? Are you stupid? This is why Eminem fans get made fun of so much.
2013, last year what does it matter? My point is that he's still active and isn't quitting any time soon.

The song premiered via YouTube, on October 14, 2013 and was released in the US on October 15, as the third single from Eminem's eighth studio album, The Marshall Mathers LP 2 (2013). And we dont get mad fun of bc we know our shit u idiot. So he was right and u apparently dont know Eminem
Ur an idiot dude last year 😅😅 and what have you accomplished that makes you so awesome to write that statement ??
I haven't, did I ever say I had? I'm addressing the people that say he's getting old and ain't doing shit anymore.
I changed it so y'all can bitch about something else have fun
Yeah he's changed over time but while he's alive let's enjoy his music,  we can still listen to the classics i.e.  Stan, Lose Yourself, When I'm Gone,...

Eminem is and always be an icon.  Go watch the interviews he has on the bonus dvd from The Eminem Show.  One thing he said is that he always wants to evolve, that he wants his albums not to sound like any of his previous albums.  That's the sign of a great artist.

Yeah, I love his older stuff.  To this day, I think TES is (pound for pound) his best.  MMLP & SSLP are really sick and will always be classics.  But the guy has kept pumping out albums & staying relevant.  Are they at the same caliber as his first 3? It depends.  He's added a lot of complexity to his music & lyrics.  I'm sure if he'd kept putting out albums that sounded/felt like SSLP/MMLP/TES, he'd be untouchable.  But as a great artist, he wanted to change things up.
SHADYXV was decent but not the greatest thing ever.
Relapse/refill is amazing what are ya talking about
yeah ,he stills young ,i dnt know what he does to still be a young, u've said that u gonna die tice,when will be the first?
